name: seedr-cc
title: Seedr.cc
description: Streamline your torrent management with the Seedr.cc Raycast extension, enabling you to effortlessly add magnet links from the clipboard, manage downloads, and more.
author: Aayush9029

commands.name: view-torrents
commands.title: View Torrents
commands.subtitle: Seedr.cc
commands.description: Keep track of your Seedr downloads.

commands.name: add-magnet-link
commands.title: Add Magnet Link
commands.subtitle: Seedr.cc
commands.description: Import magnet links from the clipboard to Seedr.
